    • Constructor Detail

      • Zystem

        public Zystem(int m)
       throws UnSupportedLoggerException
        Throws:
        UnSupportedLoggerException

      • Zystem

        public Zystem()
       throws UnSupportedLoggerException
        Constructor. Mode is taken from the java system property "gnu.io.log.mode". The available values are :
        • SILENT_MODE No logging
        • FILE_MODE log to file
        • NET_MODE
        • MEX_MODE
        • PRINT_MODE
        • J2EE_MSG_MODE
        • J2SE_LOG_MODE log to java.util.logging
        Throws:
        UnSupportedLoggerException
